guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Guts is a lone mercenary with a tragic past. He wields a massive sword known as the Dragon Slayer and is on a quest for revenge against the God Hand.

griffith.name: Griffith
griffith.role: Leader of the Band of the Hawk
griffith.description: Griffith is a charismatic and ambitious leader. He forms the Band of the Hawk and has a mysterious and complex connection with the God Hand.

casca.name: Casca
casca.role: Commander of the Band of the Hawk
casca.description: Casca is a skilled warrior and Guts' love interest. She is fiercely loyal to Griffith and plays a crucial role in the story.

puck.name: Puck
puck.description: Puck is a mischievous and tiny fairy who becomes Guts' companion. He provides comic relief in the dark world of Berserk.
